title: Heads and tails
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation and Michael Cole
brief_description: A film for children, looking at bird behaviour. Focuses mainly on newt swans but also shows peacocks, turkeys, farmyard chickens and ducks. Narrated by Derek Griffiths.
description: A film for children, looking at bird behaviour. Focuses mainly on newt swans but also shows peacocks, turkeys, farmyard chickens and ducks. Narrated by Derek Griffiths.
